overview: After a man gets out of prison, he decides to go straight and leave his life of crime behind him. However, when he gets home he finds that his brother is in danger and the family farm is in foreclosure. He plans to take revenge on those responsible, but finds that he may have taken on more than he can handle.
tagline: Kidnapping, Seduction, Robbery ... Wanna go for a ride?
title: One Way Out
